page.title: 20LITTLE WITLEY WILDLIFE
page.content: { Arable farming's carefully {controlled conditions}severely restrict wildlife but the area has hedges and open watercourses; there are also copses which act as wildlife reservoirs.Several exposures of Keuper sandstone with north easterly exposure carry pockets of xerophytic plants. Areas of permanent grass, usually on moist sites, carry a wide range of plants and invertebrates. The{orchards}with Leyland Cyprus windbreaks have many songbirds but the widest variety of species occurs in the{old woodland site}of Ockeridge where productive timber-growing has produced conditions including treetops, sheltered rides, moist undergrowth and the specialized dry, acid and sterile conditions of old oak coppice sites.{Few pheasants}are reared in this block.
